div.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-size: small; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; text-align: start; letter-spacing: normal;

img.div:
Breakfast 8-9AM / Lunch 11-12 at KMS Door #8....FREE for any child ages PK-18. Delivery available!
​

div.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-size: small; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; text-align: start; letter-spacing: normal;

img.div:
Kids Closet - They have bags packed with a week of food (per child) and will deliver to any family that needs it. They just need to call 574-896-5927 ext. 4 and leave your information.
​

div.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-size: small; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; text-align: start; letter-spacing: normal;

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); margin: 0px 0in 12pt 0.5in; font-size: small; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; text-align: left; letter-spacing: normal;

color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); margin: 0px 0px 0px 0.5in; font-size: small; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; text-align: left; letter-spacing: normal;

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Verdana, sans-serif; color: black;

p.span: Bowen Center is proud to partner with schools in our communities and we will continue to serve students during closures related to the COVID-19 response. There may also be students struggling with the gravity of this issue who are not current patients but are covered under our Student Assistance Program partnership with their school. If you are a current patient, we will be reaching out to you. If you are not a patient or have questions, please call (800) 342-5653. We’re the hope.

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); margin: 0px 0px 0px 0.5in; font-size: small; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; text-align: left; letter-spacing: normal;

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Verdana, sans-serif; color: black;

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); margin: 0px 0px 0px 0.5in; font-size: small; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; text-align: left; letter-spacing: normal;

color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); margin: 0px 0px 0px 0.5in; font-size: small; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; text-align: left; letter-spacing: normal;

color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); margin: 0px 0px 0px 0.5in; font-size: small; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; text-align: left; letter-spacing: normal;

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Verdana, sans-serif; color: black;

p.span: Bowen Center is proud to partner with businesses in our communities with our Employee Assistance Program. We will continue to serve those employees during closures related to the COVID-19 response. If you are a current patient, we will be reaching out to you. If you have questions, please call (800) 342-5653. We’re the hope.
